attributes.action: Reduce the age of Cervical Smears to 20yrs of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the recent decision to not reduce the age where women are able to have Cervical Smears, I petition that the decision be overturned and reduce the age to 20yrs of age.

Jade Goody was not the first woman in her 20's to die of Cervical Cancer and will sadly not be the last. If the government allow the NHS to commence Smears at 20yrs of age then more women can be caught at the early stages and treated affectively.
